Module mesakit.map.ui.desktop
Package com.telenav.mesakit.map.ui.desktop.graphics.drawables

Class BaseMapDrawable

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.drawables.BaseDrawable
com.telenav.mesakit.map.ui.desktop.graphics.drawables.BaseMapDrawable
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.Drawable, Bounded, MapDrawable
Direct Known Subclasses:
LabeledMapShape
public abstract class BaseMapDrawable extends com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.drawables.BaseDrawable implements MapDrawable
A Drawable base class for objects that can be drawn on a map. Adds a map Location to the DrawingPoint location in BaseDrawable.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
